channel.title: Shallow Brook Software
channel.description: Recent content on Shallow Brook Software

item.title: Bare-Metal Assembly on the Longan Nano
item.description: Introduction The Sipeed Longan Nano is a small, affordable, 32-bit RISC-V chip. Despite its minimalism, the Longan Nano provides enough power and peripherals to learn RISC-V assembly and build exciting programs along the way. The Longan Nano comes with the following components: 108 MHz GigaDevice GD32VF103[CBT6] 32-bit CPU 128 KB flash storage 32 KB sram memory 3 LEDs (red, green, and blue) 1 USB Type-C port 1 microSD card slot 160x80 pixel LCD (0.

item.title: Welcome to Shallow Brook Software
item.description: Intro Welcome to Shallow Brook Software! My name is Andrew Dailey and I’m a software hobbyist in Des Moines, Iowa, USA. This website is a simple platform for me to document the things I do and the thoughts I have. I also plan to utilize this as a portfolio for projects that I deem complete and worth showcasing. About the name The name of this site is an homage to the old phrase “A shallow brook babbles the loudest”.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Andrew Dailey and I’m an independent programmer from Des Moines, Iowa. I have multiple years of industry experience working a variety of jobs from Linux system administration to Python-based ETL to large-scale system automation. Programming is my primary hobby and I tend to focus on high-performance, systems software. I am proficient in Python and C and am currently honing my skills with Go and Rust. When it comes to writing C, I’ve spent plenty of time researching and testing the most effective way to achieve simple, cross-platform application builds.

item.title: Projects
item.description: JamQL Third-party Spotify application that allows the user to explore track using a fully-features SQL dialect and create playlists from the results. Skylark Cross-platform CHIP-8 emulator written in C. simpleriscv Simple, cross-platform RISC-V assembler. adventure Simple platform for developing cross-platform text adventure games. SRGP Simple Raster Graphics Package - C graphics library restoration from 1997.
